敩字的基本解释

敩
（斆）
xiào
教导：“惟敩学半。”
效法：“卢每致书疏，凡一事别为一幅，朝士至今敩之。”

敩
（斆）
xué
古同“学”：“为敩者宗。”

敩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiào］
［《廣韻》胡教切，去效，匣。］
亦作“學2”。“敩1”的繁体字。亦作“斅1”。
(1)教导，使觉悟。
(2)效法；模仿。
(3)指读书。
(4)学校。

敩字的起名意思

学习，效法。教导。

Basic explanation of words
Li
(斆)
xiào
Teaching: "Only learn half."
Follow the example: "Lu Mei wrote a book, every thing is not a picture, and the dynasty has kept it until now."

xué

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiào］
["Guang Yun" Hu teaches cutting, to effect, box. ]
Also known as "Learning 2". Traditional characters for "敩1". Also known as "斅1".
(1) Teaching and enlightenment.
(2) Imitate; imitate.
(3) Refers to reading.
(4) School.

xiào, xué
